ing: 1 cup sunflower seeds, or more to taste
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is not a sweet or mayo-heavy slaw. The dressing is creamy and rich and the sunflower seeds give it a great crunchy heartiness. Men who hate veggies gobble this up!"
ins: Mash eggs, avocado, olive oil, garlic, and lemon-pepper seasoning together in a bowl until sauce is smooth. Add cabbage and Greek yogurt to sauce and toss until evenly coated. Mix onion, sunflower seeds, and broccoli into cabbage mixture until evenly coated. Mix lemon juice, salt, and pepper into slaw. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
